description: Try our easy to follow Sugarless Fruit Granola Bars recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Sugarless Fruit Granola Bars Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 crisp sweet apple, peeled, cored, and coarsely chopped
5 fresh Medjool dates, pitted and coarsely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Toss the apple with the lemon juice, agave syrup, and cinnamon in a bowl, then spread out on the lined baking sheet and roast in a preheated oven, at 162°C, for 20 minutes. Remove from the oven and let cool.

Increase the oven temperature to at 175°C. Pulse all the ingredients for the granola together in a food processor a few times until mixed and mashed. Fold in the cooled roasted apple, then spoon into a lightly oiled 20cm square, shallow cake pan and level with the back of a spoon. Bake in the oven for 20 minutes.
Let cool for 15 minutes before cutting into 9 squares to serve.
